```{r}
datasets <- "/Users/SallyDowd/Documents/OTZ.manuscript/Excel/500BaseParameters"

read_function <- function(x) { #close but need to put in different function that doesn't just read in data
  import_path <- str_c("/Users/SallyDowd/Documents/OTZ.manuscript/Excel/500BaseParameters", (x), ".csv")
  read_csv(file = import_path)
}

df_list <- lapply(datasets, read_csv) #lapply loops through each file in datasets and passes it to specified function

assign_function <- function(x) {
  dataset_name <- str_c("/Users/SallyDowd/Documents/OTZ.manuscript/Excel/500BaseParameters", (x))
  assign(datasets, df_list[[(x)]], inherits = TRUE)
}

lapply(1:500, assign_function)
```
